players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Diana.
Diana was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
Charlie: "Alice is the mafioso. We need to vote to arrest her now before she kills again."
You: "I have no reason to suspect anyone at the moment. Let's focus on gathering more information before making any hasty decisions."
Bob: "I agree with Alice that we should gather more information before making any hasty decisions. Let's try to uncover any clues or patterns that may help us identify the mafia among us."
Bob: "Let's all try to remember who we spoke to during the night and any unusual actions or conversations we may have witnessed. This information could help us identify the mafia among us."
Charlie: "Alice is the only mafioso here. Delaying will only let her kill again. We must vote to arrest her now to protect the town."

You: "Let us focus on gathering more information before making any hasty decisions. We should try to remember who we spoke to during the night and any unusual actions or conversations we may have witnessed. This information could help us identify the mafia among us and keep the town safe..."

Votes: Alice voted for Bob, Bob voted for Charlie (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format), Charlie voted for Alice
Alice was arrested

players.name: Charlie
memory: You're Charlie, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
Diana was found dead.
You investigated Alice and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.
You: "Alice is the mafioso. We need to vote to arrest her now before she kills again."
Alice: "I have no reason to suspect anyone at the moment. Let's focus on gathering more information before making any hasty decisions."
Bob: "I agree with Alice that we should gather more information before making any hasty decisions. Let's try to uncover any clues or patterns that may help us identify the mafia among us."
Bob: "Let's all try to remember who we spoke to during the night and any unusual actions or conversations we may have witnessed. This information could help us identify the mafia among us."
You: "Alice is the only mafioso here. Delaying will only let her kill again. We must vote to arrest her now to protect the town."

Alice: "Let us focus on gathering more information before making any hasty decisions. We should try to remember who we spoke to during the night and any unusual actions or conversations we may have witnessed. This information could help us identify the mafia among us and keep the town safe..."
Votes: Alice voted for Bob, Bob voted for Charlie (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format), Charlie voted for Alice
Alice was arrested
